original_text: For example, a wicked person might give back something that he has taken from someone as a guarantee. Or he might give back things that he has robbed from people. A wicked person might start to obey the laws that give life. He might stop doing evil things. If wicked people change like that, then they will continue to live. They will not die as punishment for their sins.
korean_text: 저당물을 도로 주며 강탈한 물건을 돌려 보내고 생명의 율례를 지켜 행하여 죄악을 범하지 아니하면 그가 반드시 살고 죽지 아니할지라

sentences.original_text: a wicked person might give back something
that he has taken from someone as a guarantee
Or he might give back things
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그는 물건들을 돌려줄 수 있다

sentences.original_text: that he has robbed from people
A wicked person might start to obey the laws
sentences.korean_translation: 악인은 법을 지키기 시작할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: He might stop doing evil things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 악한 일들을 멈출 수 있다

sentences.original_text: If wicked people change like that
then they will continue to live
They will not die as punishment for their sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 죄에 대한 벌로 죽지 않을 것이다
